title: Italian Meatloaf
directions: Heat coconut oil in a medium skillet over medium heat. Add diced onions and chopped roasted red pepper to the pan. Cook until onions are soft and translucent.
Combine all other ingredients in a bowl. Add onions and peppers when they are done cooking. Use your hands to mix it all together. Pour mixture into a loaf pan. Bake for 35-40 minutes.
Note: Divide the loaf into 4 servings. Eat one serving for dinner and another for lunch tomorrow. Freeze the other 2 servings to eat during Week 3.
ingredients: sea salt & black pepper to taste
